channel.title: Shop Help
channel.description:
Go me! I've added all the skillcape requirements! Now, I the only thing is, I don't want some pansy bloke to sell them to you. I want the lumbridge guide to sell the skillcapes. How can I do this?
Many Thanks,
Syrillia.

item.title: Shop Help
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

This is not what I meant. I meant that instead to talking to Thessalia to buy them, you talk to the Lumbridge guide instead. But, no matter, I fixed it now.

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Help
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

Make a shop then add all the skill capes into the shop then change the prices that you want him to sell them to you for

Read full topic
